backend/main.mo: Minimal actor with no state or backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend features to their affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting title to TickTaskTime and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell with timers, backgrounds, music, settings sheets, and alert providers.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlertS: UI card to toggle timer completion alerts.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlerts: Context provider persisting alert settings and showing toast+beep on completion.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: UI for choosing image/video/YouTube backgrounds with brightness and volume controls.
Provides background state and revokes old blob URLs safely.
Renders image, video, or YouTube backgrounds with brightness control and error handling, resetting and clearing state on failures. Manages loading, playback, and displays fallback UI on errors.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame API once and resolves when ready, exposing TypeScript definitions for the player. Handles script injection failures and global callbacks.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Provides helpers to infer media types, validate URLs, probe image/video loadability, extract extensions, and generate user-friendly error messages. Supports both MIME and extension-based detection.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Manages background state, validating URLs, probing media, loading persisted settings, and supporting image, video, and YouTube backgrounds. Ensures stored configs are sanitized before use.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Initializes and sizes a YouTube IFrame player for background playback, handling autoplay issues, resize logic, and YouTube error codes. Reports audio and embed errors to the parent.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses YouTube URLs to extract video IDs across multiple formats and builds embed URLs optimized for background playback. Returns clear error messages for invalid or unsupported URLs.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: Creates a context for managing music playback state, exposing URL, type, volume, and controls backed by useMusic. Ensures components access music state via the provider.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI for entering music URLs, controlling volume, and managing active music state with error handling.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Renders hidden audio or embed iframes and manages playback logic for Spotify, Apple Music, or direct audio.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses music URLs to classify them as Spotify, Apple Music, direct audio, or unknown and generates embed URLs.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: React hook handling music state, persistence, parsing, volume, and playback error management.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Sheet UI for showing the current URL, copying it, opening it, and warning when in embedded preview mode.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook detecting whether the app is running inside an iframe to identify preview mode.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting reminders with dialogs and sorting by due date.
frontend/src/features/reminders/useRemin: Hook managing reminders with localStorage persistence and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: UI component for a configurable countdown timer with start, pause, reset, and time input controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Hook managing countdown logic, persistence, start/pause/reset, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: UI for an interval timer alternating between A/B intervals with rounds, progress, and controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Hook handling interval switching, rounds, timing, persistence, and skip/start/pause/reset logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: UI for a Pomodoro timer showing work/break cycles, counts, and adjustable segment settings.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Hook implementing Pomodoro cycle logic, segment transitions, persistence, and timing controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: UI component for a repeating countdown timer with controls, settings inputs, and completion alerts.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Hook managing repeating timer logic, state persistence, countdown, and cycle completion handling.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Numeric input component allowing controlled editing with clamping, focus handling, and validation.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Minu: Component splitting a total seconds value into editable minute and second inputs with clamping.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: Interactive rotary dial UI for adjusting numeric values via drag or touch rotation.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions to format seconds or milliseconds into human-readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Hook providing an interval tied to React state that maintains callback accuracy during updates.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: UI component for a stopwatch with start, pause, lap recording, and lap list display.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Hook implementing stopwatch timing, laps, and state updates using an accurate interval.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: Bottom bar UI allowing users to toggle timer visibility.
Hook managing persisted timer visibility with auto-hide logic and user override tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider that manages authentication state, login, logout, and persisted identities using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, color variables, typography, and utility styles including rotary dial and YouTube background helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins using CSS variables from the theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending feature requests for the TickTaskTime app.
